comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: See comments at

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content:
New York Times of Jan 2, 1916
indicates that Dietz, then fooball coach at Washington State, was known as the "Beau Brummel of the western coaches" and often arrived to coach in a frock coat and silk hat, and porting a stick.

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thank you swanq for your research on Dietz. What a character! The photographs of him are interesting montages as well.  We'll add some of the information to the record the next time we update.
